item.description: As a software developer, you will always find yourself in times when someone is putting an abysmal amount of pressure on you to complete something. This is normal and not something under your control. Accept this is how every job works and take it for granted as the oxygen in the air you breathe. Can this be avoided? If you have an enlightened project manager/team leader/whatever, she won’t put any pressure on you.
